name: De Finetti paper: Probabilismo
description:
Bruno de Finetti’s Probabilismo defends a subjective, operational view of probability 
		based on coherent betting odds and exchangeability, rejecting objective chance. Influenced by his mathematics 
		and pragmatic/operationalist leanings, de Finetti’s ideas reshaped debates on probability and remain influential.
